Class RequestService

Object
RequestService
public class RequestService extends Object
Service class for managing request Handles request creation, deletion, approval and rejection

    • createWithdrawalRequest

      public void createWithdrawalRequest(String studentId, Application app, String reason) throws ObjectAlreadyExistsException, ObjectNotFoundException
      create request to withdraw application and add to request repository
      Parameters:
      studentId - student id
      app - application object
      reason - reason for withdrawal
      Throws:
      ObjectNotFoundException - if application can not be found
      ObjectNotFoundException - if there has been a request created already
      SecurityException - if illegal access of application by student
      ObjectAlreadyExistsException

    • acceptWithdrawalRequest

      public void acceptWithdrawalRequest(String requestId) throws ObjectNotFoundException
      accept withdrawal request and delete request from repository
      Parameters:
      requestId - request ID
      Throws:
      ObjectNotFoundException - if request cannot be found
